aka: The Oil Factor: Behind the War on Terror

cast.name: 爱德华·阿斯纳 Edward Asner

this_title: The Oil Factor: Behind the War on Terror
trans_title: 石油：反恐旗帜下的战争
The Oil Factor: Behind the War on Terror
introduction: Today, 6.5 billion humans depend entirely on oil for food, energy, plastics & chemicals.Population growth is on a collision course with the inevitable decline in oil production.George Bush's "war on terror" happens where 3/4 of the world's remaining oil and natural gas is located.
chinese_title: 石油：反恐旗帜下的战争
foreign_title: The Oil Factor: Behind the War on Terror
